program.name: texinfo
program.install:
gmake install
ginstall -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_doc} ginstall -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/texinfo ginstall -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/pdftex ginstall -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/plain/dvips
# copy texinfo files ginstall -m 644 -o root -g 0 doc/*.texi ${_doc} ginstall -m 644 -o root -g 0 doc/texinfo.txi ${_doc}/texinfo.texi
# copy TeX files ginstall -o root -g 0 -m 644 doc/epsf.tex \ ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/plain/dvips ginstall -o root -g 0 -m 644 doc/pdfcolor.tex \ ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/pdftex ginstall -o root -g 0 -m 644 doc/texinfo.tex \ ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/texinfo ginstall -o root -g 0 -m 644 doc/txi-??.tex \ ${_datadir}/texmf/tex/texinfo

item.para: Add support for AIX 4.3.3. While stpcpy() is in libc, the prototype is not available unless you -D_LINUX_SOURCE_COMPAT. Because it was introduced in ML7, we refrain for backwards compatibility.
